info.+content: This consists of 3 movies that each represent a case. Case 1: Mika has to investigate the case of a women who caused mayham but turns out to be a psychologist in a remote facility for latent criminals. Case 2: Teppei is invited to join a new group by Frederica Hanashiro. She tells him that al the downsides of being an Enforcer will disappear if he joins her new group. This leads to Teppei thinking back to his time in the military and the event and subsequent investigation that caused his Hue to decline. Case 3: Kougami is travelling through Asia and ends up in Tibet-Himalayan Alliance Kingdom. A country torn apart by internal strife.There he meets a young girl named Tenzing and comes into contact with Frederica Hanashiro.
2020-07-24 (Spain, Festival Nits de cinema oriental de Vic, Case 1-3)
#2: "All Alone With You" by Masayuki Nakano
#3: "Namae no nai Kaibutsu" (Nameless Monster) by Masayuki Nakano
